response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item holds significant value for us, reflecting over $800,000 in investment and expertise. Considering its unique features and unparalleled benefits, we are extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it. We kindly propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. We believe this offer reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also acknowledges its potential to significantly impact your endeavors. Should you find this proposal appealing, we would be delighted to discuss further details and explore how we can make this acquisition a reality for you.", "product_price": 1200000}
